name: sepulchrally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or suggests death or places where people are buried : It was sepulchrally dark in the chamber and we could not see a thing until Max found the light switch. I was impressed by the station's sepulchrally massive booking hall.
More examplesFewer examplesA stench emanated sepulchrally from the sewer. The nurse kept her voice sepulchrally low as she informed us of what was happening in the operating theatre. We could only make out the shadows of certain figures in the sepulchrally lit room.
